column1: Little Goat Diner////We shared the crab dip which was just "eh". All were expecting way more crab than cheese
column2: which was the opposite. It was hard to even tell there was crab in it. That being said
column3: we were hungry enough that we did eat all of its cheesiness and asked for more crackers to finish it off. One friend had the fried pickle sammich
column4: which looked super unique and had a happy eater enjoying it and the other had the BBQ pork sammich which was good
column5: but not memorable or incredibly unique. Having not eaten white carbs in who knows how long
column6: said friend was perfectly content inhaling the soft roll that came on top. My fish tostada officially goes on the list of things I will most certainly think about often and want to eat again with an Incredible balance of flavors and textures...perfect.
